title: Issue Tracker
summary: Full‑stack bug tracker with auth, labels, and search.
description: A pragmatic bug/issue tracker for small teams. Includes JWT auth, CRUD tickets, labels, search/filtering, and Dockerized dev setup.

title: Data Pipeline + Dashboard
summary: ETL of public dataset into Postgres with a Streamlit dashboard.
description: Orchestrated ingestion of a public dataset (CSV/JSON) with transforms in Pandas/SQL, loaded into Postgres, visualized via Streamlit.

title: API Aggregator with Caching
summary: Unified search API with Redis caching and rate limiting.
description: Combines multiple public APIs under a single interface. Adds caching, retries, and OpenAPI docs.

title: Serverless URL Shortener
summary: AWS Lambda + DynamoDB short links with analytics.
description: Serverless app to create and manage short URLs and view click analytics. Infrastructure via IaC.

title: Realtime Kanban Board
summary: Drag‑and‑drop task board with presence via WebSockets.
description: Realtime task board using Socket.IO/WebSockets with columns, dragging, and basic presence indicators.

title: Tiny Search Engine
summary: Tokenization, inverted index, TF‑IDF ranking, simple UI.
description: Indexes a small corpus and serves ranked results via a minimal API and UI.
